definitions.text: the regulation of occurrence, pace, or coordination to achieve a desired effect (as in music, theater, athletics, mechanics)
measure the time or duration of an event or action or the person who performs an action in a certain period of time
assign a time for an activity or event
examples: The candidate carefully timed his appearance at the disaster scene

definitions.text: set the speed, duration, or execution of
examples: we time the process to manufacture our cars very precisely

definitions.text: regulate or set the time of
adjust so that a force is applied and an action occurs at the desired time
examples: The good player times his swing so as to hit the ball squarely
